medium: Cotton, silk, gold metal tape, sequins
title: Jacket
description: black whorl cloth jacket with blue striped lining; front edge woven striped blue tape with scroll embroidery on applied blue silk; neck shoulder and sleeves (except cuff) heavily decorated on black satin in floral and fauna patterns in multicolor braid embroidery and applique with gold tape at edging; twined raised gold tape accents on sleeves; fronts longer than back
